data.text: @DrBreaky @TamsynVR Sorry for what is happening Michael. This is terrible.

@DrBreaky Yep. Except these rains ain’t related to  divine intervention but rather anthropogenic influence. 

We are dry but can’t leave the western suburbs as all roads out flooded. Some poor fellow drowned in his car just down the road.
@DrBreaky Sorry to hear mate. Hope she is doing ok
@DrBreaky Wow I’m so sorry. It’s terrible, and the fact that climate cha he is being ignored is a travesty

@DrPhilipMosley "biblical" is the term I'm using to describe the rains Phil - better communicates the end of times feels when watching whole towns wash away
hope you guys survived okay in brisbane. my mother in law still flooded in at cooroy
@DrBreaky Hope your family is ok Michael. Rain has been epic here in Brisbane.
@DrBreaky When is the next Federal Election? Time to get a person who is a real leader to get into power…

@russpoldrack Thanks Russ - good on your bro-in-law

This rain is "biblical" in it's fury
@DrBreaky My brother in law is there to do flood rescue and had to get rescued from the roof of the hotel where he was resting. Hope everyone can stay safe…

@TamsynVR No water, no power, thousands of people on the rooves of their houses. Very thankful my sister lives part way up a hill

All of this is so utterly predictable with climate change + i am so angry about it :-(
